ABOUT.about: Currently pursuing MS in Computer Science (Artificial Intelligence) at the University of Southern California with a GPA of 4.0. Have extensive expertise in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Software Development. Have work experience as SDE (React), Researcher (NLP). Have built several projects using technologies like Computer Vision, NLP, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Reach, NodeJS, etc.

EDUCATION.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science (Artificial Intelligence)
B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering

details: Developed critical features in the video/audio editing studio
Upgraded Google Analytics from GA3 to GA4.
Handled user migration to a newer version of the software
Optimized performance for heavy usage of the software
Developed an NLP Question Answering model for tabular and paragraph based financial data under Dr. Chetan Arora
Worked with several advanced models like AlBERT, TaPaS, ELECTRA, etc
Achieved high accuracy with the model developed on benchmark QA datasets.

EXPERIENCE.companyName: Velozity Global Solutions India Pvt. Ltd.
details: Worked on both frontend and backend development of several projects
Collaborated with over seven other while working on the projects.
Worked with several technologies like ReactJS, NodeJS, NextJS, NestJS, ChakraUI, ReactStrap, etc.
Developed ECG monitoring interface, Business landing websites and demonstration webapps.
Develop an Intelligent Text Normalization for ASR systems that would be used in SAMSUNG products in the future.
Worked with advanced technologies such as BERT networks and XgBoost models.
Were able to achieve 99.7% accuracy with the proposed model.
